events.description: Do you want to learn how to speak tech for you next interview, coffee chat, or to sound smart with your friends? ITC is hosting a How to Speak Tech event on Thursday, November 26 from 4:00pm - 5:00pm. We'll be talking about startups, current and upcoming tech trends, what technology can enable, and tech strategy.
Hear from two Ivey alumni about exiting investment banking to work at a tech company, life after graduation, and lessons learned throughout their careers.
